text: After reading the Mandarin dialogue below, you will be able to invite your friends to the movies (电影).小红：小明，你明天想跟我去看电影吗？小明：什么电影？小红：狮子王。小明：我不太喜欢狮子王。小红：那我们看星球大战吧？小明：好的，然后我们可以喝咖啡。小红：好的，明天见!小红：Xiao Ming, do you want to watch a movie with me tomorrow?小明：What movie?小红：The Lion King.小明：I don’t really like The Lion King.小红：Then let’s watch Star Wars?小明：Alright, after that we can drink coffee.小红：Ok, see you tomorrow!1 – 他们会看什么电影？a. 狮子王b. 霍比特人c. 星球大战d. 功夫熊猫2 – 看电影之后，他们会做什么？a. 喝茶b. 喝咖啡c. 回家d. 吃饭1. c2. bReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
